key_events.description: The latest dividend per share was R$1.3 with an ex date of February 03, 2026 and a payment date of February 13, 2026.
XP Investimentos projected a dividend yield of 12.3% for the next 12 months, with an estimated monthly average of R$0.93 per share.
BTG Pactual has a buy recommendation with a target price of R$95.00.

risk_factors: Fluctuations in CRI rates may impact fund performance.
Market valuation changes can affect the average rate for IPCA.
Vacancy rates, if increased, can affect fund income.

investment_thesis.bull_case: KNIP11 offers a compelling investment opportunity due to its high dividend yield (14.66% current, 12.3% projected by XP Investimentos), buy recommendation from BTG Pactual with a target price of R$95.00, and diversified CRI portfolio across various sectors including offices (31.8%), shopping malls (31.2%), and logistics (21.7%).
investment_thesis.bear_case: Potential risks include fluctuations in CRI rates, market valuation changes affecting IPCA rates, and possible increases in vacancy rates impacting fund income. The fund's DY CAGR (5 years) is -6.98, indicating a historical decline in dividend growth over that period.

summary_markdown: KNIP11 shows a bullish sentiment based on recent data. The latest dividend was R$1.3 (ex date February 03, 2026, payment date February 13, 2026). The current dividend yield is 14.66%. XP Investimentos projects a 12.3% dividend yield for the next 12 months (R$0.93 monthly average). BTG Pactual has a buy recommendation with a target price of R$95.00. The fund's portfolio includes offices (31.8%), shopping malls (31.2%), and logistics (21.7%). The portfolio of CRIs has an average rate of IPCA + 8.7% p.a., with market valuation elevating the average rate for IPCA + 9.93%. The fund's patrimonial value per share is R$ 92.65, and the P/VP ratio is 0.99.
